page.title: 17The Tadcaster Carnival
page.content: The main{event}of the year is the Tadcaster Carnival which in 1985 was held on the 29th June. A{carnival} queen was elected and this year it was Jeanette Adey. There were floats and little children dressed in funny{ {costumes.}There was plenty of beer and other drinks and the food included sandwiches, beefburgers, hot dogs and crisps. There were games to spend your money on with always a chance of winning it back. There was a haunted castle for the{children.}Inside it was very dark, but lights kept flashing near some bars behind which there were some scarey faces. In the evening a disco was held for the young people at the Youth Club which also had a tuck shop and games room open.
